#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	
	int T = 0; cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		
		int ans = 0, ctr = 0;
		string aran = ""; cin >> aran;
		for(int i = 0; i < aran.length(); i++)
		{
			ans += aran[i];
			ctr++;
		}//end for
		cout << char(ans/aran.length()) << endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
